column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday October 8 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: The area around this intersection is shutdown until further notice due to a gas main leak.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: All roadways toward this intersection are shutdown as follows:

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: Rosemont Garden at Pin Oak Dr.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: Lane Allen Rd at Clays Mill Rd (traffic toward Clays Mill diverted to Clays Mill).

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: Update 12:10 p.m. - Rosemont Garden is being reopened.  Southland Dr between Southview Dr and Rosemont Garden remains shutdown.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR SOUTHLAND DR / ROSEMONT GARDEN:
column4: UPDATE 12:16 p.m. - All roadways are being reopened at this time.  The right turn lane from Southland Dr to Rosemont Garden will remain blocked for repairs, but motorists may still turn right onto Rosemont Garden.
